Omek::IClassifierParams Class Reference

Interface for classifier parameters. This interface gives access to a classifier XML file. The classifier XML file defines the tracking data format, joints that are of interest, the number of frames, scaling options, etc. More...

#include <IClassifierParams.h>

virtual vector< string > getDependedGestures () const =0
virtual unsigned int getDataLength () const =0
virtual unsigned int getSizePerFrame () const =0
virtual string getModelFileName () const =0

Detailed Description

Interface for classifier parameters. This interface gives access to a classifier XML file. The classifier XML file defines the tracking data format, joints that are of interest, the number of frames, scaling options, etc.
